title: Sprint 1 Demo: AI-Facilitated Peer Discussion
description: Your partner has written their Sprint 1 reflection on paper. Enter their response below, then use AI-generated questions to have a deeper conversation together.

questions.prompt: What is ONE specific skill gap you identified this sprint that you didn't fully recognize before starting this course?
questions.partnerInstructions: Read your partner's written response carefully, then type it below as accurately as you can. Don't paraphrase — capture their actual words.
questions.placeholder: Type your partner's written response here exactly as they wrote it...
questions.aiContext: This is a Sprint 1 reflection in CST349 (Professional Seminar). Students have been working on identifying their soft skill gaps through self-assessment. The course focuses on self-directed learning, interview skills, and professional growth.
questions.discussionPrompt: Use these questions to have a 3-5 minute face-to-face conversation with the author. Take turns — the partner asks, the author responds. Then summarize the key insights below.

questions.prompt: What is your plan for working on this skill gap over the next sprint? Be specific about what you'll do differently.
questions.partnerInstructions: Now ask the author to read their second response (about their growth plan). Type it below.
questions.placeholder: Type your partner's growth plan response here...
questions.aiContext: The student is describing their specific plan for improving a soft skill gap they identified. This is a Sprint 1 goal-setting exercise. Look for specificity, actionability, and realistic self-assessment.
questions.discussionPrompt: Discuss these questions together. Pay attention to whether the plan is specific and actionable. Summarize your conversation below.

questions.prompt: After discussing both responses with your partner, what is the single most important thing you learned about their growth journey — or about your own — from this conversation?
questions.placeholder: Reflect on the full conversation you just had...
